mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member( member_code, member_pw, department_no, project_code, benefit_code, member_name, member_resident_number, member_start_work, member_last_work, member_last_work_cause, member_position, member_bank, member_account, member_bank_name, member_basic_pay, member_meal_pay, member_car_pay, member_post, member_address ) values( member_seq.nextval, #{member_pw}, #{department_no}, 1, 1, #{member_name}, #{member_resident_number}, #{member_start_work}, #{member_last_work}, #{member_last_work_cause}, #{member_position}, #{member_bank}, #{member_account}, #{member_bank_name}, #{member_basic_pay}, #{member_meal_pay}, #{member_car_pay}, #{member_post}, #{member_address} )
mapper.select: SELECT m.member_code, m.member_name, m.member_start_work, d.department_name FROM MEMBER m, DEPARTMENT d WHERE m.department_no = d.department_no

SELECT m.member_code, m.member_name, m.member_start_work, d.department_name FROM MEMBER m, DEPARTMENT d
where instr(${type},#{keyword}) > 0
order by member_code desc
